description: Player News Search - Contextual news aggregation in Team/Player DNA tab

userStories.title: Create news search input in Player DNA tab
userStories.description: As a user, I want a search input in the Player DNA tab so I can search for news about the selected player.
acceptanceCriteria: Search input appears in the Team/Player DNA section when a player/team is selected
Placeholder text: 'Search news for [Player/Team Name]...'
Search triggers on Enter key or search button click
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Implemented with controlled input, Enter key handler, and Search button

userStories.title: Add mock news data for beta
userStories.description: As a developer, I need mock news data to demonstrate the feature before real API integration.
acceptanceCriteria: Create mock news dataset with 10-15 sample articles for Bills, Dolphins, Chiefs, Eagles
Mock data includes variety of sources (RSS, Twitter, Reddit, ESPN)
Each article has: id, headline, snippet, source, url, timestamp, relatedTeams array
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Moved before US-003 since results display depends on data structure

userStories.title: Display news results with headline, snippet, and source
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see search results that show the headline, a preview snippet, and the source so I can quickly scan relevant news.
acceptanceCriteria: Each result card shows: headline (clickable), snippet (2-3 lines max 150 chars), source tag, timestamp
Source tags are color-coded: RSS (blue), Twitter (sky), Reddit (orange), API (green)
Clicking headline opens source in new tab
Results appear in chronological order (newest first)
Search filters mock data by team name match in headline, snippet, or relatedTeams
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Show loading and empty states
userStories.description: As a user, I want clear feedback when searching so I know the system is working.
acceptanceCriteria: Loading spinner appears while filtering results (simulate 300ms delay)
Empty state message when no results: 'No news found for [query]. Try a different search.'
Error state if something fails: 'Unable to load news. Please try again.'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
